alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 10:21AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Windham, Tolland, southeastern Hartford and southeastern Hampden Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1021 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cromwell, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Manchester, East Hartford, Glastonbury, Vernon, Mansfield, South Windsor, Rocky Hill, Ellington, Tolland, Coventry, Stafford, Somers, East Windsor, Hebron, Marlborough, Willington, Columbia, Hampden, Bolton, and Ashford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
